content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The remuneration shall be paid once a month, in arrears, on the last day of each month. If the last day of the month falls on a day off, the remuneration shall be paid on the day proceeding that day. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Salary is paid to the bank account provided by Employee upon employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
